attributes.action: Article 50 must be triggered.  Brexit means Brexit!
attributes.additional_details: Tony Blair's incredibly damaging Labour government came into power with less than 30% of the votes, thanks to our 'first past the post' system with lots of constituencies.  The vote to leave Europe wasn't like that.  It was a straight vote, each person's vote counting equally - actually TRUE DEMOCRACY at work.  Therefore, the result means a great deal more than our Elections ever do.
attributes.background: 54% of the people voted to leave the EU.  This is a massive percentage.  Most governments in this country come into power with a great deal less than that.  Only a small number of powerful people want to stay on the gravy train of the EU.  Europe is damaging for Britain.
